TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CCDirector extends System.Object

summary.para: This class is responsible for maintaining a stack of objects to be rendered.

remarks.para: This class is responsible for maintaining a stack of objects to be rendered.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Determines if the current scene can be popped (this means, there is more than one scene in the director).
Docs.value: True if the PopScene method can be invoked.
Docs.remarks: This returns true if there is more than one scene being managed by this director.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool DeserializeState() cil managed

Docs.summary: Reads the serialized state of the director and all of its scenes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void PopScene() cil managed

Docs.summary: Pops out a scene from the queue. This scene will replace the running one. The running scene will be deleted. If there are no more scenes in the stack the execution is terminated. ONLY call it if there is a running scene.

MemberSignature.Value: public void PopScene (float t, CocosSharp.CCTransitionScene s);
.method public hidebysig instance void PopScene(float32 t, class CocosSharp.CCTransitionScene s) cil managed
.method public hidebysig instance void PopToRootScene() cil managed

Docs.summary: Pops out all scenes from the queue until the root scene in the queue. This scene will replace the running one. Internally it will call popToSceneStackLevel(1)

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void PopToSceneStackLevel(int32 level) cil managed

Docs.summary: Pops out all scenes from the queue until it reaches level. If level is 0, it will end the director. If level is 1, it will pop all scenes until it reaches to root scene. If level is <= than the current stack level, it won't do anything.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void PushScene(class CocosSharp.CCScene scene) cil managed

Docs.summary: Suspends the execution of the running scene, pushing it on the stack of suspended scenes.

remarks.para: The new scene will be executed. Try to avoid big stacks of pushed scenes to reduce memory allocation.
Only call it if there is a running scene. If you do not have a running scene, call instead.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ReplaceScene(class CocosSharp.CCScene scene) cil managed

Docs.param: Scene that will take the place of the current scene.
Docs.summary: Replaces the running scene with a new one. The running scene is terminated.
Docs.remarks: Must be called only if there is a running scene.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ResetSceneStack() cil managed

Docs.summary: Clears the scene stack, stopping execution.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RunWithScene(class CocosSharp.CCScene scene) cil managed

Docs.summary: Enters the main loop and starts your first scene.

remarks.para: Enters the 's main loop with the given . Call it to run only your first scene, do not call it if there is already a running scene.

Docs.summary: Returns the number of scenes on the stack.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SerializeState() cil managed

Docs.summary: Write out the current state of the director and all of its scenes.
